Posts.Content: favabee wrote: Could any offer advice on some of the best cancer centers around, places where they're doing the best work? My mom has been diagnosed with mets to her lungs and liver and we'd like to try a second opinion. She hasn't always gotten the best care at her hometown oncologist (this is her fourth time with breast cancer) in Wisconsin or at the hospital in Madison. Thanks for any ideas! Posts.Title: Best cancer centers favabee Fidelia

Posts.Content: favabee wrote: Hi, My momÂ has mets to her liver and lungs. She's been in chemo for 10 weeks, Avastin and Taxol, and her liver tumor shrunk by half, but her lung tumors (many) neither grew nor shrank. Her tumor markers are way down too. Should we be happy with this result? She's scheduled for 4-6 months of chemo total. I just feel anxious that her lung tumors seem to be just sitting there waiting until the chemo is over. At what point does a second opinion make sense? Thanks. Tamara Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Second Opinion favabee chainsawz

Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2010 06:17PM favabee wrote: Thanks for asking! Her tumors are estrogen and progesterone positive, but not HER2+.
